metadata.title: CVE-2021-33192 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in the HTML pages of Apache Jena Fuseki allows an attackerto execute arbitrary javascript on certain page views. This issue affectsApache Jena Fuseki from version 2.0.0 to version 4.0.0 (inclusive).

criterions.comment: apache-jena package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
